Sql.query: insert into sic.cpa_porcentaje_monto ( cpapmtcodi, cpapcodi, cparcodi, emprcodi, cpapmtenemes01, cpapmtenemes02, cpapmtenemes03, cpapmtenemes04, cpapmtenemes05, cpapmtenemes06, cpapmtenemes07, cpapmtenemes08, cpapmtenemes09, cpapmtenemes10, cpapmtenemes11, cpapmtenemes12, cpapmtenetotal, cpapmtpotmes01, cpapmtpotmes02, cpapmtpotmes03, cpapmtpotmes04, cpapmtpotmes05, cpapmtpotmes06, cpapmtpotmes07, cpapmtpotmes08, cpapmtpotmes09, cpapmtpotmes10, cpapmtpotmes11, cpapmtpotmes12, cpapmtpottotal, cpapmttrames01, cpapmttrames02, cpapmttrames03, cpapmttrames04, cpapmttrames05, cpapmttrames06, cpapmttrames07, cpapmttrames08, cpapmttrames09, cpapmttrames10, cpapmttrames11, cpapmttrames12, cpapmttratotal, cpapmtusucreacion, cpapmtfeccreacion ) values ( :cpapmtcodi, :cpapcodi, :cparcodi, :emprcodi, :cpapmtenemes01, :cpapmtenemes02, :cpapmtenemes03, :cpapmtenemes04, :cpapmtenemes05, :cpapmtenemes06, :cpapmtenemes07, :cpapmtenemes08, :cpapmtenemes09, :cpapmtenemes10, :cpapmtenemes11, :cpapmtenemes12, :cpapmtenetotal, :cpapmtpotmes01, :cpapmtpotmes02, :cpapmtpotmes03, :cpapmtpotmes04, :cpapmtpotmes05, :cpapmtpotmes06, :cpapmtpotmes07, :cpapmtpotmes08, :cpapmtpotmes09, :cpapmtpotmes10, :cpapmtpotmes11, :cpapmtpotmes12, :cpapmtpottotal, :cpapmttrames01, :cpapmttrames02, :cpapmttrames03, :cpapmttrames04, :cpapmttrames05, :cpapmttrames06, :cpapmttrames07, :cpapmttrames08, :cpapmttrames09, :cpapmttrames10, :cpapmttrames11, :cpapmttrames12, :cpapmttratotal, :cpapmtusucreacion, :cpapmtfeccreacion )

update sic.cpa_porcentaje_monto set cpapcodi = :cpapcodi, cparcodi = :cparcodi, emprcodi = :emprcodi, cpapmtenemes01 = :cpapmtenemes01, cpapmtenemes02 = :cpapmtenemes02, cpapmtenemes03 = :cpapmtenemes03, cpapmtenemes04 = :cpapmtenemes04, cpapmtenemes05 = :cpapmtenemes05, cpapmtenemes06 = :cpapmtenemes06, cpapmtenemes07 = :cpapmtenemes07, cpapmtenemes08 = :cpapmtenemes08, cpapmtenemes09 = :cpapmtenemes09, cpapmtenemes10 = :cpapmtenemes10, cpapmtenemes11 = :cpapmtenemes11, cpapmtenemes12 = :cpapmtenemes12, cpapmtenetotal = :cpapmtenetotal, cpapmtpotmes01 = :cpapmtpotmes01, cpapmtpotmes02 = :cpapmtpotmes02, cpapmtpotmes03 = :cpapmtpotmes03, cpapmtpotmes04 = :cpapmtpotmes04, cpapmtpotmes05 = :cpapmtpotmes05, cpapmtpotmes06 = :cpapmtpotmes06, cpapmtpotmes07 = :cpapmtpotmes07, cpapmtpotmes08 = :cpapmtpotmes08, cpapmtpotmes09 = :cpapmtpotmes09, cpapmtpotmes10 = :cpapmtpotmes10, cpapmtpotmes11 = :cpapmtpotmes11, cpapmtpotmes12 = :cpapmtpotmes12, cpapmtpottotal = :cpapmtpottotal, cpapmttrames01 = :cpapmttrames01, cpapmttrames02 = :cpapmttrames02, cpapmttrames03 = :cpapmttrames03, cpapmttrames04 = :cpapmttrames04, cpapmttrames05 = :cpapmttrames05, cpapmttrames06 = :cpapmttrames06, cpapmttrames07 = :cpapmttrames07, cpapmttrames08 = :cpapmttrames08, cpapmttrames09 = :cpapmttrames09, cpapmttrames10 = :cpapmttrames10, cpapmttrames11 = :cpapmttrames11, cpapmttrames12 = :cpapmttrames12, cpapmttratotal = :cpapmttratotal, cpapmtusucreacion = :cpapmtusucreacion, cpapmtfeccreacion = :cpapmtfeccreacion where cpapmtcodi = :cpapmtcodi
select * from sic.cpa_porcentaje_monto order by cpapmtcodi

select temp.tipoemprcodi, temp.tipoemprdesc, emp.emprnomb, emp.emprruc, pmt.* from sic.cpa_porcentaje_monto pmt inner join si_empresa emp on emp.emprcodi = pmt.emprcodi inner join si_tipoempresa temp on temp.tipoemprcodi = emp.tipoemprcodi where (-1 = {0} or pmt.cparcodi = {0}) order by case when temp.tipoemprcodi = 3 then 1 when temp.tipoemprcodi = 4 then 2 when temp.tipoemprcodi = 2 then 3 when temp.tipoemprcodi = 1 then 4 end, emp.emprnomb
